result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Initial Scheduling Order
Calendar call on November 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Activity:  Arraingment   
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

1:56 PM  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Anderson L. Hereford appeared by audio but cannot connect to audio.  Attorney Taylor Klokow appeared by video for attorney Kelly James Mattingly for Anderson L. Hereford.  Information filed, copy to Attorney, reading waived.   Not guilty plea entered on behalf of defendant and jury trial to be set.  Bond continued.
Arraignment on August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:36 PM Prosecuting attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Anderson L. Hereford appeared by phone.  Attorney Kelly James Mattingly appeared by video for Anderson L. Hereford. Defense stipulates to identification of Defendant. Deputy Cody St. Michael sworn in and testified by video. State moves for bind over. Defense objects without argument. Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information.
Arraignment scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

02:22 PM Defendant Anderson L. Hereford in court by video with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video.  Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Complain to attorney.  Reading waived.  Preliminary hearing requested by zoom.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Activity:Return on warrant
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

02:05 PM Defendant Anderson L. Hereford in court by video with no audio with attorney Kelly James Mattingly by video.  Kyle Edward Johnson  and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Warrant vacated. Reinstate previous bond. Cash bond posted to be returned to poster.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Original warrant returned June 1, 2022
Court date given on Rock County Sheriff bond receipt: June 27, 2022 at 1:00 pm

Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Status Report

Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:23 PM Defendant Anderson L. Hereford in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Kevin M Smith by video. Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $1,500.00 with conditions: No possession of any weapons. No driving without a valid drivers license or valid insurance. Must remain in residence between the hours of 6pm-6am unless at work or traveling to and from work.  Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 1PM.
